author: James Shimota
releaseNotes:
0.2.2 - added variable for user request time in minutes - now has 0 and no lead 0
Added fix for scheduler drop down pre-fill.
Fixed bug on suffix of ordinal
0.2.3 - added WeekOfYearNumOdd and Even for garbage can users
0.2.4 changed all Booleans to strings as not supported in rm5
0.2.5 added Even Odd variables for Day Of Month
0.2.6 added Even Odd variables for Day Of Year
0.2.7 debug text in log when disaabled fixed, 24hr no lead fix
0.2.8 added string versions of comparison date time
